idea-plugin.name: Gauge MindMap
idea-plugin.description:
Visualize Gauge specifications as interactive mindmaps

Gauge MindMap is an IntelliJ IDEA plugin that transforms your Gauge specification files into beautiful, interactive mindmap visualizations. Navigate and understand your test specifications at a glance.

Key Features:

  • Interactive Mindmap View - Visualize Gauge specs as hierarchical mindmaps with smooth navigation
  • Pan & Zoom - Navigate large mindmaps with mouse drag and zoom controls
  • Minimap Navigation - Quick overview and navigation with an interactive minimap
  • Node Interaction - Hover, select, and click nodes to explore your specifications
  • Collapse/Expand - Collapse or expand nodes to focus on specific areas
  • Search & Filter - Filter mindmap content by text to find specific specifications
  • Export to Image - Export your mindmap as a high-quality PNG image
  • Auto-refresh - Automatically updates when specification files change
  • Context Menu Integration - Right-click files/folders in Project View to show mindmap

Usage:

Open the "Gauge Mindmap" tool window from the bottom panel, or right-click on Gauge specification files/folders in the Project View and select "Show Gauge Mindmap".

Perfect for understanding complex Gauge test structures, documenting test flows, and navigating large specification hierarchies.

action.description: Show Gauge specification mindmap for selected files/folders
